articles.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Nifty below 19,400, Sensex down 3o0 pts; FMCG, oil & gas drag - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Except PSU Bank, all other sectoral indices ended in the red with capital goods, Oil & Gas, power, FMCG and Information Technology down 0.3-0.9 percent.
articles.content:
Benchmark indices ended lower on August 17 with Nifty below 19,400 amid selling across the sectors barring PSU Banks.
